001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.steps;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedVector;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vectors;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.LearningRateConfigurable;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.UpdateStep;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.ExplicitRegularization;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.Regularizations;
012
013import java.util.Map;
014import java.util.Set;
015
016public class VanillaGradientDescent<N extends Number> implements UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N>, LearningRateConfigurable<N> {
017
018    private N learningRate;
019
020    public VanillaGradientDescent(N learningRate) {
021        this.learningRate = learningRate;
022    }
023
024    @Override
025    public Vector<N> calculateUpdate(Vector<N> gradients, LinearCombination<N> model, int step, Set<ExplicitRegularization<N>> regularizations) {
026        Array<N> parameters = model.getParameters();
027        Vector<N> thetas = new TypedVector<>(parameters, true, model.getNumberTypeSupport());
028        Vector<N> regularizationGradients = Regularizations.applyExplicitRegularization(regularizations, thetas, gradients);
029        return regularizationGradients.multiply(model.getNumberTypeSupport().negate(learningRate));
030    }
031
032    @Override
033    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
034        return Map.of(HP_LEARNING_RATE, learningRate);
035    }
036
037    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
038    @Override
039    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
040        if (HP_LEARNING_RATE.equals(name)) {
041            this.learningRate = (N) value;
042        }
043    }
044}
